svg.text: News Cache Flow - Real-time News App Implementation
1. Breaking News: Ultra-fast cache (5min TTL), instant refresh, push notifications, top priority
2. Regular News: Balanced cache (30min TTL), background refresh, category-based organization
3. Feature Articles: Long-term cache (6h TTL), full-text search, offline reading support
4. Media Optimization: Multi-resolution images, progressive video, publisher branding cache
5. Intelligence: User interest tracking, trending detection, source reliability scoring
6. Performance: 89% hit rate, <50ms breaking news, 48h offline content, 300MB storage
Rate limiting, priority routing, RSS/API fallbacks
